title: Jhoom Beauty Whitening Cream And Soap Set With Avocado Extract ? Natural Skin Brightening, Deep Cleansing, And Glowing Complexion
description:
Description
Jhoom Beauty Whitening Cream And Soap Set With Avocado Extract ? Natural Skin Brightening, Deep Cleansing, And Glowing Complexion

Experience The Power Of Natural Radiance With The Jhoom Beauty Whitening Cream And Soap Set. Enriched With Avocado Extracts, Aloe Vera, And Essential Vitamins, This Dual-Action Skincare Combo Deeply Cleanses, Hydrates, And Brightens The Skin. The Beauty Soap Removes Dirt, Oil, And Impurities While Maintaining Skin Moisture, And The Whitening Cream Enhances Fairness, Reduces Dark Spots, And Gives A Smooth, Even-Toned Complexion. Suitable For All Skin Types, It Helps Restore Natural Glow And Softness With Visible Results In Just 3 Days. Perfect For Daily Use To Achieve Fresh, Luminous, And Healthy-Looking Skin.

Key Features:
Natural Avocado Extracts For Deep Nourishment And Hydration

Brightens And Whitens Skin Tone Within 3 Days Of Regular Use Reduces Dark Spots, Pigmentation, And Uneven Skin Tone

Soap Gently Cleanses While Maintaining Skin Moisture

Whitening Cream Enhances Glow And Smooth Texture

Infused With Vitamins And Natural Moisturizers

Suitable For All Skin Types ? Safe For Daily Use

Provides A Fresh, Radiant, And Youthful Complexion

Net weight Cream 30g | Soa 125g

Quality Original
